entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [8.0] [OSX] Long Running Test: System.Security.Cryptography.Rsa.Tests.RSAKeyFileTests.ReadEncryptedRsa16384 #95094
  • Move more of the Android Crypto PAL layer into Java #95093
    Future
  • [mono][wasm] Add interpreter support for calls to UnmanagedCallersOnly EntryPoint without managed delegate reference #95087
    9.0.0
  • Enable workload to consume wasi-sdk packages #95086
  • [mono][wasm] wasm interop tracking #95084
    9.0.0
  • Passing generic class with nullable reference type in JsonSerializableAttribute raises CS8620 when used #95083
    Future
  • Checked/Release asm diffs failure: Assertion failed 'compiler->compIsaSupportedDebugOnly(HWIntrinsicInfo::lookupIsa(intrin.id))' #95081
    9.0.0
  • JsonSerializer IgnoreReadOnlyProperties Not Working for Enumerable Properties #95080
  • Console.IsInputRedirected returns true on git bash when there is no redirected input #95079
  • Assertion failed 'OperIs(GT_LCL_VAR, GT_LCL_FLD, GT_PHI_ARG, GT_STORE_LCL_VAR, GT_STORE_LCL_FLD, GT_LCL_ADDR)' #95078
    9.0.0
  • Update System.Linq.Expressions ref code for #94069 #95077
  • why we need dotnet.wasm? #95076
  • .NET 8 `QuicConnection` AuthenticationException: RemoteCertificateNameMismatch #95072
  • Linux: Segfault in strlen running helloworld.cs #95070
  • iOS runtime tests should use just-run xharness command instead of run #95060
    9.0.0
  • TrimmerRootDescriptor is not able to preserve generic instantiations #95058
  • Logging Source Generator fails to compile using keyword parameters with @ prefixes depending on the placeholder order #95057
    Future
  • JIT: Missing zero initialization of stackallocs converted to locals for "init mem" mismatches during inlining #95056
    9.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Memory.Span #95073
  • The input string 'System.ReadOnlySpan<Byte>[2]' was not in a correct format. #95044
    Future
  • Behavior changes with optimizations on x86 #95043

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: Add overload of `Type.GetMethod` that takes a name, generic parameter count, binding flags and parameter types #90995
    9.0.0
  • GetMonthName for HijriCalendar #50548
    Future
  • NET5.0 vs NETCore3.1 - Strings comparison between space and non-breaking-space characters #53856
    Future
  • Incorrect ordering of Slovak words in F# and C# #58362
    Future
  • Can't import Component Model functions in WASI apps #94513
    9.0.0
  • How to cancel StreamReader.ReadLineAsync with a CancellationToken or set timeout to stop reading? #42976
    Future
  • create WASM module import from any `[DLLImport]` which doesn't match known static native symbols #86984
    9.0.0
  • `CultureInfo` constructor fails with string "x-TEST" #60737
    Future
  • maybe create WASM module export from `[UnmanagedCallersOnly]` #86985
    9.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'genCountBits(availableSet) == 1' #95025
    9.0.0
  • JIT: EH successors do not account for handler -> handler flow in the presence of filters #94974
    9.0.0
  • crossgen2 fails on FIPS enabled systems (due to MD5 hashing) #94786
  • NativeAOT app crashes when run on a machine with an ETW session with GCHeapDump and Type keywords enabled #88491
    9.0.0
  • Asserts from ILLink analyzers #94260
  • Asserts in ILLink analyzer #94858
  • FailFast from JIT_GetGenericsGCStaticBase (from R2R publish build) #95064
  • `Math.Sin` difference between FW and 8 #95059
  • JIT: SSA does not add proper phi args for second pass EH successors #94954
    9.0.0
  • Make it easy to determine entry assembly path when debugging CoreCLR #94474
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Revert "Revert "Update to the latest dotnet/command-line-api version"" #95092
    NO-MERGE, area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [release/6.0-staging] Permit MD5 regardless of FIPS configuration for Linux #95090
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security
  • [release/7.0-staging] Permit MD5 regardless of FIPS configuration for Linux #95089
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security
  • Make build VMR cross build compatible #95088
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • JIT: Add a "DFS blocks" phase #95085
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #95082
    area-codeflow
  • Add a optional AOT mode on wasm which doesn't depend on c++ unwinding so … #95074
    NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm
  • Introduce CallConvSwift and special register types to represent the Swift ABI calling convention #95065
    api-suggestion, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Fix printing Helix workitems count for Android #95061
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Ensure ExceptionStringIds are handled #95053
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasi] Initial wasi/aot build support #95051
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 9.0.0

Merged

  • Type.GetMethod(name, genericParameterCount, bindingAttr, types) overload #94889
    area-System.Reflection, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Implement initial support for WasmImportLinkage in the AppBuilders #94615
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Set frozen cache emscripten variable conditionally #95015
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [JIT] Optimize constant V512 vector with broadcast #92017
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Do not mark st1 StoreSelectedScalar variant as needing consecutive registers #95052
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Keep fgBBcount up to date #95034
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Model that handler flow can bypass filters #95062
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add eng/pipelines/common/variables.yml to coreclr pipelines #95063
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add SVE InstructionSet for Arm64 #95021
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • Fix managed ContentionStart data #95035
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, community-contribution
  • Revert "[release/8.0] Downgrade 6 & 7 per tactics" #95075
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure, 8.0.1
  • [release/8.0-staging] Use live M.Bcl.AsyncInterfaces dependency #94459
    Servicing-approved, area-System.DateTime, 8.0.1
  • [release/8.0-staging] [mono][interp] Fix incorrect stack type information #94966
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 8.0.1
  • [release/8.0-staging] Permit MD5 regardless of FIPS configuration for Linux #94979
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, 8.0.1
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix Vector512.CopyTo #95026
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, 8.0.1
  • [release/6.0-staging] Store entry assembly path for easy access for diagnostics #95049
    Servicing-approved, area-Host, 6.0.26
  • [release/7.0-staging] Store entry assembly path for easy access for diagnostics #95047
    Servicing-approved, Servicing-consider, area-Host, 7.0.16
  • [release/8.0-staging] Store entry assembly path for easy access for diagnostics #95045
    Servicing-approved, area-Host, 8.0.1
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix for a stress crash in ComAwareWeakReferenceNative::HasInteropInfo #94649
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.1
  • Initial gcdump support #94673
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [ILLink analyzer] Improve handling of invalid operations #94888
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Revert "Replace LowLevelLock with Lock" #95071
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Convert S.R.InteropServices.Marshal COM-related FCalls to QCalls #95038
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Clean up NYI_RISCV64 in CodeGen and Emitter #94666
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Replace LowLevelLock with Lock #94991
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Dump BB in/out memory SSAs inline when SSA is valid #95017
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Grammar update for Chunk<TSource>(this IEnumerable<TSource> source, int size) returns xmldoc #95010
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • Update HttpClientBuilderExtensions.cs #94869
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory, 9.0.0
  • Split commands in FtpWebRequest #95009
    area-System.Net, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Implement eval (ICorDebugEval related). #95020
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • JIT: Process all EH successors for "in-block" defs in SSA #94955
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Store entry assembly path for easy access for diagnostics #95027
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr

Updated

  • Extending testing domain for VARIANT #95095
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 9.0.0
  • Memory mapped stresslog for NativeAOT #92506
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (Noble Numbat) Runtime Identifiers to .NET 6.0 #94913
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution, 6.0.x
  • [NativeAOT] Fix Lock's usage of NativeRuntimeEventSource.Log to account for recursive accesses during its own class construction #94873
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Flush-to-zero behavior for float-to-int conversion #94762
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [RISC-V] Add DynamicHelpers to riscv64 stubs #94735
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Fix LSRA handling of arm32 double registers and spilling #94947
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add Predicate register placeholder methods and Z registers #95016
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add new Pipeline for Running Libs Tests with TestReadyToRun #91229
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Remove BBJ_NONE #94239
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Change to use std int for Interop tests #95040
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, test-enhancement, 9.0.0
  • [mono][debugger] Improve debugger features #94066
    area-Debugger-mono
  • We already have cross-compilers etc for musl and win-arm64. Actually use them #94876
    area-Build-mono
  • [perf] Run localized Blazor scenario #95023
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, perf-pipeline
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix JsonArray.Add and ReplaceWith regressions. #94882
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.1
  • [release/8.0-staging] Do not generate broken debug info for non-methods #94757
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.1
  • Do not Path.Join user directory if it's "C:" #94587
    area-System.IO, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 9.0.0
  • Add empty SVE API for Arm64 #94791
    NO-MERGE, area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Enable EVEX feature: Embedded Rounding for Avx512F.Add() #94684
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Fix ILLink/ILC hang when tracking too many hoisted local values #95041
    area-Tools-ILLink, needs-area-label
  • JIT ARM64/SVE2: Add increment/decrement from predicate register instructions #94811
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization use system ICU #93220
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • `JsonSerializerOptions.Web` for `JsonSerializerOptions` #94370
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 9.0.0
  • Combine rootDir with relative file names #94528
    NO-MERGE, breaking-change, area-Extensions-FileSystem, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 9.0.0
  • Add EventSource event for WaitHandle waits #94737
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • Unify parsing part of BigInteger with CoreLib #85978
    area-System.Numerics, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [mono] Add runtime support for Swift calling convention on x64 and arm64 #94764
    area-VM-meta-mono, new-api-needs-documentation, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Set version in ZIP local header to ZIP64, when the file offset is >4GB #94970
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Improve ConcurrentDictionary xml docs #94993
    documentation, area-System.Collections, 9.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] add Intrinsics' API for LoongArch64. #94400
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Move ManagedToNativeGenerator out-of-process #94446
    area-Build-mono
  • [wasm] Fix regressed file sizes for blazor #92664
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [RISC-V] Implement NativeWalker. #94853
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [IGNORE][wasm] debugging debugger tests #94965
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
